examples.example: 在实习期间，我收获了满满的实践经验和珍贵的友谊。

translate.english: During the internship period, I gained a lot of practical experience and precious friendship.

examples.example: 通过这次实习，我不仅提升了自己的专业能力，还培养了良好的团队协作精神。

translate.english: Through this internship, I not only improved my professional ability, but also cultivated a good spirit of teamwork.

examples.example: 实习的这段日子虽然忙碌，但也让我感受到了成长的快乐。

translate.english: Although the days of internship are busy, it also makes me feel the happiness of growth.
